DOC.brief_summary: Hollister Incorporated is studying stoma related cost of care related to a new ostomy skin barrier that is designed to maintain adhesive properties and good peristomal skin health compared to other currently marketed barriers.
DOC.criteria: Ostomy patients who: Have healthy peristomal skin Are within 12 weeks post op Ostomy patients who: Have a fistula, wound, lesion or suspected infection in the peristomal area Are inpatient in healthcare facility
